mapper.select: select recipe_no as recipeNo, recipe_title as recipeTitle , recipe_writer as recipeWriter, recipe_contents as recipeContents, recipe_mainimg as recipeMainimg, recipe_cat1 as recipeCat1, recipe_cat2 as recipeCat2, recipe_count as recipeCount, recipe_time as recipeTime, recipe_level as recipeLevel, recipe_item as recipeItem, recipe_step as recipeStep, recipe_stepimg as recipeStepimg, recipe_like as recipeLike, recipe_hit as recipeHit, recipe_price as recipePrice, recipe_date as recipeDate from recipe where (select to_char(recipe_date,'mm') from recipe) = #{month}
